1. Have a rule zero
  2. There are no rules
  3. Study the symbolic systems of art, music, literature. and religion
  4. Let all your things have their places; let each part of your business have its time
  5. Expand your sense of the possible
  6. Seek first to understand, then to be understood
  7. Tithe (wisely) to help create community and care for others
  8. Pursue what is meaningful (not what is expedient)
  9. Know your body
  10. A good disposition is invincible, if it be genuine
